problem.title: Global Investing is Broken and Fragmented
problem.description: Most investors stop before they even start because the process is a disconnected maze of foreign laws, languages, and untrusted vendors.

languageBarriers.title: Language Barriers
languageBarriers.description: Navigating foreign contracts and tax laws without a local guide is dangerous.

disconnectedProviders.title: Disconnected Providers
disconnectedProviders.description: Your lawyer doesn't talk to your mortgage broker, causing delays and lost deals.

zeroKnowledge.title: Zero Knowledge
zeroKnowledge.description: Not knowing where to invest or how to accurately assess risk in a foreign market.

trustDeficit.title: Trust Deficit
trustDeficit.description: Fear of scams, unverified developers, and lack of trusted partners abroad.

howItWorks.title: Turning Chaos into a Guided Flow

sarahL.title: Real Estate Attorney

safety.question: Is investing abroad safe through GlobalNest?
safety.answer: Safety is our priority. We only list properties from verified developers. Our marketplace connects you with vetted legal professionals who perform due diligence on every deal before you sign.

experience.question: I have no experience. Is this for me?
experience.answer: Absolutely. GlobalNest was built for the "Zero Knowledge" investor. Our AI explains every step in simple terms, and human experts handle complex details.

financing.question: Can I get financing for international properties?
financing.answer: Yes. Our Financing Hub connects you with Israeli banks offering cross-border mortgages and local lenders in the destination country.

vetting.question: How do you vet the professionals?
vetting.answer: Every professional undergoes strict verification, including license checks, interviews, and track record reviews with international clients.

cta.title: Your Global Portfolio Starts Here
cta.description: From zero knowledge to your first global property—with one AI-powered platform.
cta.disclaimer: No credit card required for Explorer plan.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Everything you need to know about investing through GlobalNest

items.question: How much does it cost to use GlobalNest?
items.answer: GlobalNest offers a free Explorer plan to browse properties and access basic features. Our Pro plan ($49/month) includes unlimited AI analysis, financing tools, and full deal room access. There are no hidden fees or commissions on property purchases.

items.question: Is investing abroad safe through GlobalNest?
items.answer: Safety is our top priority. We only list properties from verified developers and connect you with vetted legal professionals who perform due diligence. Our secure deal room ensures all transactions are protected, and we provide comprehensive insurance options for your investment.

items.question: Can I get financing for international properties?
items.answer: Yes! Our Financing Hub connects you with both local and international lenders who specialize in cross-border mortgages. We work with Israeli banks offering international financing and local lenders in your target country to find the best rates and terms.

items.question: How long does the investment process take?
items.answer: The timeline varies by market and property type, but typically ranges from 60-90 days from offer to closing. Our platform streamlines the process significantly compared to traditional methods, with digital documentation and automated compliance checks.

items.question: Do I need to travel to buy a property?
items.answer: While we recommend visiting the property if possible, it's not required. Our platform includes virtual tours, video consultations with local agents, and comprehensive property reports. Many of our investors complete purchases entirely remotely with confidence.

items.question: What markets do you cover?
items.answer: We currently offer properties in Israel, United States, Europe (Greece, Cyprus, Portugal, Spain), and UAE. We're continuously expanding to new markets based on investment demand and opportunity quality.

cta.title: Ready to Start Your Investment Journey?
cta.description: Join thousands of investors who trust GlobalNest for their global real estate investments

hero.title: About GlobalNest
hero.description: We're on a mission to democratize global real estate investment and empower investors worldwide

mission.title: Connecting Investors with Global Opportunities
mission.description: GlobalNest was founded on the belief that investing in real estate shouldn't be limited by geography, language barriers, or lack of local connections. We're building the world's first truly global real estate operating system.
mission.vision: Our vision is to make international property investment as simple and accessible as investing in your home country, with the trust, transparency, and support you deserve.

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: GlobalNest was born from a personal challenge faced by our founders—American investors who wanted to invest in Israeli real estate but were overwhelmed by the complexity, language barriers, and lack of trusted local partners.
story.paragraph2: After experiencing the frustration firsthand, we realized this wasn't just an American-Israeli problem. Millions of investors worldwide face the same barriers when trying to invest across borders. The process was fragmented, risky, and often resulted in missed opportunities or costly mistakes.
story.paragraph3: In 2023, we set out to solve this problem by building a platform that combines AI-powered property matching, verified professional networks, and secure deal management—all in one place. Today, GlobalNest serves investors across 15+ countries and continues to expand to new markets every quarter.
